advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t), Ye Zhang (@co0py_Cat) of Baidu Security, Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An archive may be able to bypass Gatekeeper
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A remote user may cause an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to access private information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of SSD Secure Disclosure Labs & DNSLab, Korea Univ.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption vulnerability was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: An issue in the handling of environment variables was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted Postscript file may result in unexpected app termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position can track a user’s activity
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by using HTTPS when sending information over the network.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved file handling.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A validation issue in the handling of symlinks was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improvements to the sandbox.

cves.credit: Xuxiang Yang (@another1024) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com), Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com), Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in Vim
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating Vim.

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.
